author: djrtwo
content:
eth2 call this Thursday https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/issues/129

I came down with the flu after ethdenver and got behind. catching up on everything now.
Networking call is pushed to the following week.

author: justinleroux
content:
The Boston Ethereum Developers Meetup is putting together an event on March 10 during Boston Blockchain Week which is mainly focused around the MIT Bitcoin Expo and the first Cryptoeconomic Systems Conference at MIT - if anyone might be in the area at that time and would like to speak we'd really love to have some Ethereum representation that week, in particular someone who could do  a general talk on eth2.

So far we've got Ben Jones from Optimism speaking about the OVM and L2 scaling. It'll probably be a small gathering but we hope to draw in people in town for other events as well.  https://www.meetup.com/Boston-Ethereum-Developers/events/268765520/
